00005 @implementation UIQueryTableView
00006 
00007 -(UIQuery *)scrollToBottom {
00008         UITableView *table = self;
00009         int numberOfSections = [table numberOfSections];
00010         int numberOfRowsInSection = [table numberOfRowsInSection:numberOfSections-1];
00011         NSIndexPath *indexPath = [NSIndexPath indexPathForRow:numberOfRowsInSection-1 inSection:numberOfSections-1];
00012         [table scrollToRowAtIndexPath:indexPath atScrollPosition:UITableViewScrollPositionBottom animated:YES];
00013         return [UIQuery withViews:views className:className];
00014 }
00015 
00016 @end
